one.overview: In Week 1, work with your partner and team to understand the problem, stakeholder and partner requirements, and the project scope.

pm.0: Populate backlog with tasks for the next two weeks
pm.1: Set up and prep for team meeting
pm.2: Set a up a Kickoff meeting with the partner
pm.4: Set up User Research to be conducted next week

deliverables.0: Discovery Phase worksheet (Send to your mentors and Erica)
